screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rf file in Rammerhead
screenshot.caption: RF file open in Rammerhead

description: Rammerhead is a proxy web browser that allows users to browse the Internet anonymously, through use of a proxy server . Typically, users access Rammerhead through another web browser, by navigating to https://browser.rammerhead.org .

To access Rammerhead's Settings page, users enter rh://settings in Rammerhead's address bar. There, users can set a custom HTTP proxy and customize Rammerhead's appearance. They can then select Export rammerfile to save these settings in an RF file.

common_filenames.description: Profile.rf - The default name Rammerhead assigns to RF files.
